Articles.Content: I've been loosely following the development of this game for awhile now and it looks interesting. I've been interested in playing a game like this since Shattered Horizon back in 09 but didn't have the Hardware back then.  Now of course a competitive multiplayer shooter might not be for everyone who is into KSP but I thought there might be some people here who would be interested, and there are some interesting design decisions that make it seem like the devs did at least some research.
